channel.title: ReRune, Mixing the best from start till last
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://www.rune-server.org/nophp/toplist/141202.png[/img]
Hello and welcome to the official development thread for ReRune
ReRune is a server which features all of the old content(up to 377) with some of the GOOD updates runescape had, making it the wonder revision.
[IMG]http://sg-forum.info/imgs/play.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rooneyscape.com/beta"]Play Now[/URL]|| [IMG]http://sythril.com/images/homepage/forumschat.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rooneyscape.com/forums.php"]Forums [/URL]|| [IMG]http://sg-forum.info/imgs/home.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rooneyscape.com"]Home Page[/URL]
[b]Develeopers[/b]
[ul][*]Dust R I P - [b]Dylan[/b] [*]Badger - [b]Connor[/b] [*]Fox - [b]Jamal[/b]
[b]Features & Content[/b] [list] [*]Many Minigames to play [*]Over 10 bosses to fight! (and expanding) [*]Perfect 508 char models [*]Perfect 508 animations [*]Perfect 508 maps [*]459 Gameframe to keep it mixed [*]Unique home! [*]Netty core! [*]Great combat system, made into every detail! [*]Perfect pathfinding serversided and clientsided [*]Over 15 working skills and 8 of them perfect! [*]Server & forum integration [*]Flawless Update serer, Play instantly! [*]Blazing fast dedicated server! [*]Combat system is being reworked!
[b]Some pictures:[/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lrEW[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lqJ1[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lrdu[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lrg8[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lrH4[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lrCM[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lrLT[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/1lrpm[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/1nCYI[/img]
[QUOTE][B][SIZE="5"]LEGEND[/SIZE][/B]
[B]Crimson[/B]- [B]Training Areas[/B] [B]Black[/B] -[B] Mining Areas[/B] [B][B]Yellow[/B][/B] - [B][B]Shops[/B][/B] [B]Lime[/B] - [B]Magic Tree[/B] [B]Blue[/B] - [B]Teleports & Sailor[/B][/QUOTE]
Will post updated pictures ASAP!
Please mind the domain it is not owned by the old owner, we've recently purchased it. [/CENTER][/list][/ul]

item.title: ReRune, Mixing the best from start till last
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

[CENTER]

Hello and welcome to the official development thread for ReRune

ReRune is a server which features all of the old content(up to 377) with some of the GOOD updates runescape had, making it the wonder revision.

Play Now|| Forums || Home Page

Develeopers

[ul][]Dust R I P - Dylan
[]Badger - Connor
[*]Fox - Jamal

Features & Content
[list]
[]Many Minigames to play
[]Over 10 bosses to fight! (and expanding)
[]Perfect 508 char models
[]Perfect 508 animations
[]Perfect 508 maps
[]459 Gameframe to keep it mixed
[]Unique home!
[]Netty core!
[]Great combat system, made into every detail!
[]Perfect pathfinding serversided and clientsided
[]Over 15 working skills and 8 of them perfect!
[]Server & forum integration
[]Flawless Update serer, Play instantly!
[]Blazing fast dedicated server!
[*]Combat system is being reworked!

Some pictures:

[QUOTE][SIZE=“5”]LEGEND[/SIZE]

Crimson- Training Areas
Black - Mining Areas
Yellow - Shops
Lime - Magic Tree
Blue - Teleports & Sailor[/QUOTE]

Will post updated pictures ASAP!

Please mind the domain it is not owned by the old owner, we’ve recently purchased it.
[/CENTER][/list][/ul]
